150 samples, 0 and 1, with replacement, equal probabilities
```{r}
s= sample(c(0,1), 150, replace = TRUE, prob=c(0.5,0.5))
s
summary(as.factor(s))
```
150 samples, 0 and 1, with replacement, more probabilities to 0
```{r}
s= sample(c(0,1), 150, replace = TRUE, prob=c(0.7,0.3))
s
summary(as.factor(s))
```
150 samples, 1 to 1000, no replacement, equal probabilities
```{r}
s = sample(c(1:1000),150, replace = FALSE)
s
```
Generating sample from data set
30% from iris
```{r}
s = sample(c(0,1),150, replace = TRUE, prob= c(0.7,0.3))
summary(as.factor(s))
```
Creating Sample
```{r}
irisSamp = iris[s==1,]
irisSamp
dim(irisSamp)
```
Repeating experiment
```{r}
set.seed(2345)
sample(c(1000),1)
```
Repeating again
```{r}
set.seed(2345)
sample(c(1000),1)
```
